name: Hand Ballerz
description:
The classic game you know and love from elementary school. A fun 1v1 classic handball experience. Score 5 points to win the game! A fun quick game we decided to make.

Controls:

1 player:

Move W, A, S, D

Hit: E

2nd Player:

Move I, J, K, L

Hit: U

Art by @juansolon

Programming by @_kpdwyer
